lead_paragraph: Kristine Lilly scored on a penalty kick late in overtime to give the United States a 2-1 victory against Canada in the championship game of the Concacaf Gold Cup in Carson, Calif.
snippet: Kristine Lilly scored on a penalty kick late in overtime to give the United States a 2-1 victory against Canada in the championship game of the Concacaf Gold Cup in Carson, Calif.
